29  class RinexClockStore : public ClockSatStore
30  {
31

41  RinexClockStore() throw()

45  virtual ~RinexClockStore() {};
46 
55  virtual void dump(std::ostream& os = std::cout, int detail = 0) const throw()
56  {
57  os << "Dump of RinexClockStore(" << detail << "):" << std::endl;
58  if(detail >= 0) {
59  const char *fmt="%4Y/%02m/%02d %2H:%02M:%02S";
60 
61  os << " Data stored for " << nsats()
62  << " satellites\n";
63 
64  CommonTime initialTime(getInitialTime()), finalTime(getFinalTime());
65  os << " Time span of data: ";
66  if(initialTime == CommonTime::END_OF_TIME ||
67  finalTime == CommonTime::BEGINNING_OF_TIME)
68  os << "(there are no time limits)" << std::endl;
69  else
70  os << initialTime.printf(fmt) << " TO "
71  << finalTime.printf(fmt) << std::endl;
72 
73  os << " This store contains:"
74  << (haveClockBias ? "":" not") << " bias,"
75  << (haveClockDrift ? "":" not") << " drift, and"
76  << (haveClockAccel ? "":" not") << " acceleration data." << std::endl;
77  os << " Checking for data gaps? " << (checkDataGap ? "yes":"no");
78  if(checkDataGap) os << "; gap interval is "
79  << std::fixed << std::setprecision(2) << gapInterval;
80  os << std::endl;
81  os << " Checking data interval? " << (checkInterval ? "yes":"no");
82  if(checkInterval) os << "; max interval is "
83  << std::fixed << std::setprecision(2) << maxInterval;
84  os << std::endl;
85  os << " Interpolation type is "
86  << (interpType == 2 ? "Lagrange" : "Linear")
87  << " using " << interpOrder << " consecutive data." << std::endl;
88  os << " Rejecting bad clock data is turned "
89  << (rejectBadClockFlag ? "ON":"OFF") << std::endl;
90 
91  // dump FileStore
92  clkFiles.dump(os,detail);
93 
94  if(detail == 0) return;
95 
96  os << " List of satellites and number of records:\n";
97  SatTable::const_iterator it;
98  for(it=tables.begin(); it!=tables.end(); it++) {
99  os << " Sat " << it->first << " : "
100  << it->second.size() << " records.";
101 
102  if(detail == 1) { os << std::endl; continue; }
103 
104  os << " Data:" << std::endl;
105  DataTable::const_iterator jt;
106  for(jt=it->second.begin(); jt!=it->second.end(); jt++) {
107  os << " " << jt->first.printf(fmt)
108  << " " << it->first
109  << std::scientific << std::setprecision(12)
110  << " " << std::setw(19) << jt->second.bias
111  << " " << std::setw(19) << jt->second.sig_bias;
112  if(haveClockDrift) os
113  << " " << std::setw(19) << jt->second.drift
114  << " " << std::setw(19) << jt->second.sig_drift;
115  if(haveClockAccel) os
116  << " " << std::setw(19) << jt->second.accel
117  << " " << std::setw(19) << jt->second.sig_accel;
118  os << std::endl;
119  }
120  }
121  }
122  os << "End dump of RinexClockStore." << std::endl;
123  }
124 
125 
127  bool loadFile(const std::string& filename) throw(Exception)
128  {
129  try {
130  // open the input stream
131  RinexClockStream strm(filename.c_str());
132  if(!strm.is_open()) {
133  Exception e("File " + filename + " could not be opened");
134  GPSTK_THROW(e);
135  }
136  strm.exceptions(std::ios::failbit);
137  //cout << "Opened file " << filename << endl;
138 
139  // declare header and data
140  RinexClockHeader head;
141  RinexClockData data;
142 
143  // read the RINEX clock header
144  try {
145  strm >> head;
146  }
147  catch(Exception& e) {
148  e.addText("Error reading header of file " + filename);
149  GPSTK_RETHROW(e);
150  }
151  //cout << "Read header" << endl; head.dump();
152 
153  // save in FileStore
154  clkFiles.addFile(filename, head);
155 
156  // read data
157  try {
158  while(strm >> data) {
159  //data.dump(cout);
160 
161  if(data.datatype == std::string("AS")) {
162  // add this data
163  ClockRecord rec;
164  rec.bias = data.bias; rec.sig_bias = data.sig_bias,
165  rec.drift = data.drift; rec.sig_drift = data.sig_drift,
166  rec.accel = data.accel; rec.sig_accel = data.sig_accel;
167  addClockRecord(data.sat, data.time, rec);
168  }
169  }
170  }
171  catch(Exception& e) {
172  e.addText("Error reading data of file " + filename);
173  GPSTK_RETHROW(e);
174  }
175 
176  // close
177  strm.close();
178 
179  }
180  catch(Exception& e) { GPSTK_RETHROW(e); }
181 
182  } // end RinexClockStore::loadFile()
183 
184  }; // end class RinexClockStore
185 
187 
188 } // End of namespace gpstk
189 
190 #endif // GPSTK_RINEX_CLOCK_STORE_INCLUDE
